entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Annapolis Royal
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this morning. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
